page.title: 05MIXED FARMING AT PLUMSTEAD
page.content: We visited South Lodge Farm,which is on Low Road,GT.Plumstead.The farmer has a herd of{sheep}consisting of 20 ewes and 40 lambs,they are Scotch blackface and cross border Leicester. All his lambs go for meat.He has 2 {cows}he keeps for calves.He has 18 acres of land for{fruit}and{vegetables . Some of the crops he grows are sold at his farm shop,while some go to the market.He also grows shrubs,plants and nursery stock for sale at the farm shop.The farmer does not employ any help,he starts work at 5.am and finishes at 6.pm.He works in all weathers and gets a lot of pleasure from what he does,but he says it can be tiring.He has a tractor,a drill,a sprayer and a planter.His wife is a member of the Norwich Guild of weavers spinners and dyers.She spins her own {wool.
